any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
examples: the arm of the record player

definitions.text: any instrument or instrumentality used in fighting or hunting
examples: he was licensed to carry a weapon

definitions.text: the part of an armchair or sofa that supports the elbow and forearm of a seated person

examples: botany is a branch of biology
the Germanic branch of Indo-European languages
